title: Growing awareness: Factors in plant production
creator_credit: Victorian College of Agriculture and Horticulture and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Raelyne Boyle hosts this series which forms part of an Open Learning course examining horticulture and the factors affecting and enhancing plant production.
